page.title: 10Darlington Carnival
page.content:
Darlington Council organise a carnival every year. In this {International Year of Youth}young people will take part from schools and colleges. It starts at 12 am with a parade through the twon of floats, marching bands, puppets and banners. this year is a{Medieval Carnival}with jousting, maypole dancing, a dragon competition and dragon dance.
There are games and stalls with good and bad knights. Weapons used for jousting games are: battle-axe, double-headed axe, bow sword, etc. There is a variety of events that will take place. The Carnival will be supported by the Mayor and{MP Michael {Fallon.} {Helen Skinner.
